title: Perth Royal Show
body:
Is there any possibility that there will be a LoL stall / LoL Showbag with a random skin or something or maybe have some big OCE teams, such as Legacy or Chiefs or whatever to come down for a Bo3 or something? Obviously it would be **much** harder to get some teams down, but is there any chance that League will be a presence at the Perth Royal Show, either this year or in the future?

Thanks,
og1764

replies.body:
I don't think there will be. 
We're probably too isolated and low populated.
